Reviews.Content: easy walking distance plaza heart city hotel provided quiet clean hotel service available intrusive including maid service fresh clean day watchful desk manager front door evening added sense security gated parking facility visitors hotel maintains historic feel real sense able stay unique

Reviews.Title: “Good value for your stay in Mayaguez”
Reviews.Author: lynnfe
Reviews.Content: youre traveling budget puerto rico choice clean block lovely main square mayaguez hotel convent nearby church biggest disadvantage found stayed 2 windows opportunity natural light hotel offers free continental breakfast consists cereal toast muffins instead 2block walk bakery recommended travel books

Reviews.Title: “Clean, safe, basic hotel in heart of Mayaguez”
Reviews.Author: bucketlisttravellers
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights mayaguez caribbean series baseball games hotel adequate inexpensive clean television wall beds firm hotel showers peak morning hours reached lukewarm hand towel washcloth maids extremely friendly didnt encounter rude woman earlier reviewer noted elevators prepared carry luggage stairs request ground floor 21 oddly shuttered windows lobby mornings awakened people conversing lobby doesnt stay youre resorts highend accommodations unique youre comfortable hostels bs etc support local youll happy secured parking front desk folks spoke english helpful walking distance nice plaza historical buildings unique restaurants

Reviews.Content: hotel colonial inexpensive hotel price ranges 55 75 front desk service divided polite efficient morning front desk person middle age polite helpful shift else lacks qualities morning person except eye nice offered refund leaving hotel initial stay worse hotel service specifically middle age lady constantly knocks door disturb sleep offer towels wake leave hotel day 900 am clean roomshe twice stood expressed grievance morning frontdesk lady stay hotel worse experience everi mean days handed clean towels told clean didnt clean complimenting neat beware lady

Reviews.Title: “Clean, good security and service”
Reviews.Author: CtFreddie
Reviews.Content: hotel block town square events frequent otherwise bit pretty rundown clean wifi parking secure hotel decent continental breakfast friendly helpful desk attendants limited english
